reviewText:
This is a great follow on volume of Charles Hu's anatomy workshop that builds on the work that was covered in the first volume. I would highly recommend you watch the first volume before this one; this volumes builds a lot on the work covered by the first.

It begins with a simple demonstration light and shadow on a simple sphere. These basic principles are practically demonstrated on several  live figure drawings.

It's a pity the are no figure drawing classes in the city I live because I would love to put what I have learned here in action.
